title: MedBot vs RealDoc: efficacy of large language modeling in physician-patient communication for rare diseases

abstract: Objectives This study assesses the abilities of 2 large language models (LLMs), GPT- 4 and BioMistral 7B, in responding to patient queries, particularly concerning rare diseases, and compares their performance with that of physicians. Materials and …

title: FDTs: A feature disentangled transformer for interpretable squamous cell carcinoma grading
details: P Huang, X Luo - IEEE/CAA Journal of Automatica Sinica, 2025
abstract: Dear Editor, This letter proposes an end-to-end feature disentangled Transformer (FDTs) for entanglement-free and semantic feature representation to enable accurate and trustworthy pathology grading of squamous cell carcinoma (SCC). Existing …
